channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fourth of July travel: What to know in 2024, with record crowds expected
item.description: This summer is already off to a record-breaking start, and one of the season’s biggest travel periods is still upon us: Fourth of July just days away....
